Articles.Content:
I am making a Thunderbirds part pack / mod or whatever you want to call it. I have made a Thunderbird 3 modal, but it falls apart upon launch. If anyone could help me fix this it would be great. If you want to help make this modthingy, email me at [email protected].

Cheers, Fitzy

How is it falling apart? Like does everything just detach or are there explosions before anything moves?

Better yet send it to me and I'll take a look,even just a video maybe to it disassembling itself.

How is it falling apart? Like does everything just detach or are there explosions before anything moves?

Better yet send it to me and I'll take a look,even just a video maybe to it disassembling itself.

I have sent you a private message.
